author: Jessica Lyons
title: FBI used bitcoin wallet records to peg notorious IntelBroker as UK national
description:
Pro tip: Don't use your personal email account on BreachForums
The notorious data thief known as IntelBroker allegedly broke into computer systems belonging to more than 40 victims worldwide and stole their data, costing them at least $25 million in damages, …
